link.label: Create an Hello World Application
link.text: Learn how to model and deploy a basic Web application which shows an "Hello World" message.

link.label: Add a Database to your project
link.text: Learn how to add a database to your Web project and how to manage it.

link.label: Create a simple Datacentric Application
link.text: Learn how to model and deploy a simple Web application which manages a list of customers.

link.label: Create a Custom Presentation Style
link.text: Learn how to build a custom presentation style for your Web application.

link.label: Develop the Hello World Custom Unit
link.text: Learn how to develop a custom content unit to be placed inside a page and which shows the "Hello World" message.

link.label: Check out a CVS project
link.text: Learn how to connect to a CVS repository and check out a project.

link.label: Merge CVS branches
link.text: Follow the steps for merging changes from one CVS branch into another.
